summary: This mod tries to fix the inventory icon problem on the Black and Blue Dragon Swords
descriptionHtml:
I was encountering trouble when I used this mod with the german version of the game.
When I did change the WeapMaterialDaedric of the weapon to WeapMaterialSteel, or tried to adress the item with a \"getequiped\" command the inventoryicon of the weapon did disappear.
In the original file are two \"stat\" files 1stpersonAlexBlackDragon and 1stpersonAlexBlueDragon, but they do not appear in the creation kit. I tried to mail the creator on the nexus, but was not succesful.
So I made this fix.
I hope it helps.
This is my first upload.

Feedback would be nice, if it did help.

All credits go to AlexScorpion
author: ChristianErding
